alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 07 at 8:44PM EDT until April 08 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of less than one inch, sleet accumulations of around one quarter of an inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze expected. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook, Northern Somerset, Northern Piscataquis and Central Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to noon EDT Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
